name: vimmpc
summary: Manipulate a running mpd daemon from within vim
description:
Uploading this old utility due to popular demand (and to promote interest).

About
--------

Vimmpc provides functionality for manipulating http://www.musicpd.org/
from within Vim.

Main site: http://gavin.brokentrain.net/projects/vimmpc/
install_details:
Download and extract straight to vim directory or by symlinking:-

  tar xzf vimmpc-(revision).tar.gz
  cd ~/.vim/plugin
  ln -s /path/to/vimmpc/vimmpc.vim
  ln -s /path/to/vimmpc/vimmpc.py

And finally:
  $ vim -c 'MPC' to launch. (or :MPC from within vim)
